records.story: Saw a light similar to a star that darted around the sky in straight lines. My girlfriend and I drove out the Palouse Hwy one evening to find a secluded place.  We were just outside of town and drove up a dirt road that put us into the northwest shadow of Tower Mtn.  We could see the finger shaped rocks that you cannot see from the Dishman-Mica area.  We found a spot and did our business. Afterwards we were just relaxing on a blanket in a field on a hillside looking up at the stars.  We noticed a small star that would move rapidly in a straight line one direction not very far at all then stop abruptly and change its trajectory.  This went on for a few minutes and we decided to bail, quickly, and drove back to her parent’s house. I cannot recall the conversation we had on the drive, I do recall driving fast down that dirt road though. The next day I was at work and my closest co-worker, a few years older than me, asked me if I had seen anything strange in the sky.  Our sightings were very similar. I remember it so clearly.

records.summary: What appeared to by a very large "invisible" craft making very loud, low frequency rumble.
records.story: What appeared to by a very large "invisible" craft making very loud, low frequency rumble 8:00 Pm, Sunday, September, 2012  While sitting in outdoor hot tub with my wife, we began to hear a very deep rumble, similar to a jet engine but unlike any either had ever heard.  I turned the power off to the hot tub to locate the direction of the rumble which by now the vibration could be felt physically while in the water. The sound seemed to come from all directions, North, then South, East and West.  I could see no outline of an aircraft in all directions.  The sound increased as it appeared to fly over, but again, nothing appeared against the night sky…although commercial airlines were easily spotted along with their exhaust and/or contrails. As It seemed to pass to the West, I stepped out of the hot tub onto an adjoining deck and noticed two red light, similar to the port wing light of an aircraft although these did not flash.  Now, what was amazing was the distance between these lights.  I called my wife to jump up and look, which she did and also saw the lights which by now were several miles away.  The distance between these lights at best estimate was 2000’—and no siloutte of an aircraft.  We watch the lights disappear through the horizon, but the noise, still a very low rumble continued for another 4 – 5 minutes. Our home is situated within the apporach patterns of FAFB and have seen and heard aircraft from tankers to stealth fighter but have NEVER heard an engine noise of that low frequency or decibal level. That’s it.

records.summary: Triangular Craft on Dishman Mica Road - Spokane, WA
records.story: Triangular Craft on Dishman Mica Road - Spokane, WA Dad was driving down Dishman Mica Road at night, I was sitting in back and saw a small dark triangular craft flying just above the telephone/treeline. The craft was flying ahead parallel to the car and once I saw the craft, it appeared to fall back and fly side by side, looked to be a one man triangle craft with dull blinking lights and was completely silent. No one else in the car saw it and appeared to be watching us for the duration of the drive on Dishman Mica Road (about 5 min). I looked away to tell my parents and looked back and saw the craft fly away slowly. It didn't look to be in a hurry, though I was able to make out a shape in the cockpit. I have never seen a craft fly so low and be so quiet. That is why my parents probably didn't notice it.  All this happened in the mid 80's while I was a kid, the whole family was in the car. The date above is very approximate. I'm sure it was Fall because of how early darkness was. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Bright glowing white orb, morphing into cylindrical shape and then back to orb hovering for 20- 30 minutes
records.story: Bright glowing white orb, morphing into cylindrical shape and then back to orb hovering for 20- 30 minutes At approx. 10 p.m., as I closed the window blinds in my kitchen, I noticed a bright object in the northwestern sky, about the magnitude of Venus, maybe a but brighter.  As an amateur astronomer, I knew it could not be Venus as she had set at least two hours prior.  The object did not move at all, just hovering in the distance.  I took a look with my high powered binoculars and as I did, it appeared to be a bright glowing white orb which then morphed into a cigar shape and back to an orb.  After about 20-30 minutes it simply disappeared into thin air!!!

records.summary: A round like saucer shape, with 3 bright lights orbiting over spokane, washington at 3 in the morning.
records.story: a round like saucer shape, with 3 bright lights orbiting over spokane, washington at 3 in the morning. woke up to a neighbors dog barking to see in the sky back by the hills, that there is a flying object that has been sitting there in place for the past 45 minutes or so, normal airplanes cant sit in one spot like that, thats just not normal. the flying object has 3 bright lights  on it, going horizontal across it.  i wish it was lighter to give more of a description all i know is what i see isnt normal, and i wouldnt be up at almost 4 in the morning if what i saw was normal.

records.summary: seen an alien
records.story: seen an alien I was returning home about 4 am when just off to the left of my drive way some thing stood up in the field and looked at me and when it seen me stop and get out and look in its direction  it than ran or squirmed across the street in to the trees at first I thought a deer but it was up right and running in a weird way like an octopus I think I seen it dragging one tentacle  it than went from tree to tree like it was circling me so I walk very quickly in the house making sure not to take my eyes off of it and when it was going from tree to tree it would stop at that tree and peek at me from one side or the other than move to the next tree and do the same thing at each tree so when I went in the house I grabbed a flash light to see if it was a person mind you I live in the country so I don’t really think someone was sleeping in my field and dragged there sleeping bag across the street another thing that helps me know it was not human when I shined my flash light on it its eye shined green not red like a humans would. After I saw the eye color I went back in the house waiting for it to try to get in or peek in my windows so I laid on my couch looking and waiting and listening for and nothing happened  so I just tried to go to sleep and just get over it buy this time I was in denial and thought ok it was a deer. The next morning I thought about what I saw and walked out to the field where I saw it there was nothing but I remembered what it looked like and it was up right a light shade of blue witch could have been from the moon light it was really skinny and tall  with a tear drop shaped head that kind of  just formed in to the body no shoulders and long arms that looked like tentacles. But that’s all I remember and know I can say it was flat out the most scariest moment I have ever been through I have seen ghosts and ufo’s but nothing like that and it still scares me just thinking about it and its been almost a month another thing! just a week or two before my event there was reports of stra! nge ligh ts over one of my city’s neighbor hoods that was on the news the next day or day after but I didn’t think twice about this because I was in denial about what I saw until  like two weeks after it all happened than I started realizing that it could be possible that I actually saw an alien putting the two events together

records.summary: Saw three amber lights under the half moon about 7 other lights danced around them they all blinked out total lights 20.
records.story: Saw three amber lights under the half moon about 7 other lights danced around them they all blinked out total lights 20. I saw at first three amber lights under the half moon Oct. 22nd 6:30 at night.  Around the amber lights danced 7 other lights.  Then they disappeared then they came two by two.  It lasted for about 25 minutes.  May sound strange but I got a message before the sighting.

records.summary: Large very bright silent orb flew very fast through night sky then dimmed, blinked and disappeared.
records.story: Large very bright silent orb flew very fast through night sky then dimmed, blinked and disappeared. Came home from store at 9:30 p.m.  Noticed a very large extremely bright circular object moving from northwest to southeast.  It moved very quickly and steadily.  It had no other lights around it, it was not an airplane, it was silent.  When it had travelled over our house we saw  an airplane flying towards it, the object then seemed to lose brightness and turn almost yellow while getting smaller and flickering a few ties then disappeared.    I could see a small orange light a few times just for a second then nothing.

records.summary: I saw four lights in perfect formation at about 60 thousand feet.
records.story: I saw four lights in perfect formation at about 60 thousand feet. At approximately 7:40 am I was sitting in my hot tub facing south-west.  At first I saw one white light traveling way slower than an airplane and even slower than a satellite.  I thought maybe someone had let a balloon loose but it was so high I thought it was doubtful.  I am pretty sure the altitude was twice as high as an airplane flies, so maybe 60,000 feet?  I am a private pilot so I have a little bit of experience with judging altitude, but it is hard to say because of not really knowing what I was looking at. After about 10 seconds I noticed a second and then third light that formed a perfect triangle.  The front light was white and the side lights were red, not solid red, but reddish.  After a few more seconds I saw the fourth and final light.  It was white and trailed the front white light by 3 to 4 times the distance from the front light to either of the red lights.  So what I saw was a perfect triangle of white in front and red on both side and then the trailing light. Why I am intrigued with what I saw is because of the perfect geometry of the shape.  The lights were traveling from south west to north east.  As it turns out I had a perfect view from my hot tub.  The lights travelled directly above my head.  I think it took between 10 and 12 minutes from about 30 degrees from horizon to about 120 degrees of horizon.  I am not sure if that is how you describe it but I am thinking 180 degrees spectrum. I am not sure what I saw, but I have never seen anything like it in the past.

records.summary: Dancing blue light in the sky
records.story: danceing blue light in the sky When i went out side from my house to go to a friends house. I saw a bright blue object faceing south of northen spokane. as i watched it it moved up and down and sideways.  It did this for about 5min then it just stoped moveing around.   I noteced that when i used my flash light and turned it on and i would flash the light at it it would move.  When i got to my friends house the object must have followed me there because it moved from the south west to south east.  I have been seeing this object for the past two weeks what it is i dont know. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to provide no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Nighttime fireball on July 5
records.story: Nighttime fireball on July 5 Driving to work at night when I saw this object.  Pulled off arterial onto side street to watch it pass overhead.  Saw what appeared to be an orange light approximately 1000 ft above ground travelling in a northeast direction.  Appeared to travel nearly as fast as an airplane, but made now sound.  Looked like a fireball when directly overhead.  Continued for another 30 seconds or so in same direction then disappeared out of sight. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Dozens of free Flying Stars over Spokane on sunny afternoon, taking triangular formations.  White and Red Pulsing.
records.story: Dozens of free Flying Stars over Spokane on sunny afternoon, taking triangular formations.  White and Red Pulsing. I was waiting outside my girlfriends house off of sprague when I looked in the sky and saw dozens of flying objects that looked like stars in the blue clear skys around the afternoon sun.   After ten minutes or so they began to move around slowly at first, and I noticed that some of them were red and blinking while the others looked white and sparkly.   They would take triangular formations and the red stars would take a position in the middle of the triangles.   They would move back and forth, and fly toward the horizon, and accelerate at extremely high speed until disappearing.  Then they would be replaced by others that would return, while often the red pulsing ones would stay still or move slowly.  My girlfriend came outside and I pointed out the stars asking "why are there stars over spokane in the middle of the day?"  She got binoculars, and when we observed them the white sparkly stars were only what looked three red, blue, and green lights, ! together looking white with the naked eye.  They almost looked like the pixel of an old T.V. closeup.  The red ones were just red, and clear blue sky in between pulses as if nothing was there.  Eventually, they all either shot over the horizon with seemingly parabolic acceleration, or strangly flew into the sun until unobservable.  It almost seemed like it new I saw them, since they were not hardly visible or moving at all at first, and as soon as I had binoculars they all slowly dispersed.  Whatever they were, they were definitely coordinating they're movements and seemed to like the triangle formation, although it was not a constant theme as they silently moved where ever they liked.  Also, the red blinking ones seemed to be more stationary as the white ones formed triangles around them.  I reported to the police and the airport, both said call the airforce or one of the others.

records.summary: 8 lights in formation going north west.
records.story: 8 lights in formation going north west. well i was stepping out on my porch to have a smoke and i decided to look up to view Orion and a few of the constellations west of my location and as i looked back at Orion I firs seen three lights spinning in formation about 1000 to 4000 feet going about the speed of a f-14 full throttle going north east and after they got as bright as a dimmed led on low battery five more joined and made a u formation but the ones in the middle where still spinning and after the got out of view i seen a fairchild refueler or a 747 heading south west about 30 thousand feet 2 seconds later.

records.summary: Falling star turns into flash, then flash goes away, then in a total different direction what looked like a satellite goes out of site,
records.story: Falling star turns into flash, then flash goes away, then in a total different direction what looked like a satellite goes out of site, From east to west, first thought it was a falling star due to the speed, then there was a flash, as the flash got smaller and went away, what appeared to be a satellite came from center of flash in a total different direction, now from north to south slower at the speed of a satellite until it went out of sight.  my son was with me, we both had no idea what it was.

records.summary: Two white circles covering 65 degrees in 4 seconds
records.story: Two white circles covering 65 degrees in 4 seconds I took my dog out for one last job between 12:10 and 12:20am on Sunday May 12th (early mothers day).  I was out there for less than a minute when I thought I saw a shooting star in my peripheral vision almost directly above me.  Upon focusing on it I saw two white circles, not like bright directional shining lights normally seen on a plane but just white circles.  I initially thought it could be one object total but it could be two separate in the same path of travel as the white circles were separated.  The white circles were about the same size around as a #2 pencil held out at arms length and they were spaced out to fit about two of those #2 pencil diameters in between them.  It was moving very fast from East to West.  I saw it from about 90 degrees to about 25 degrees above the horizon.  I could tell it was pretty high up because the sky was clear straight up and all the way to the east but to the west there was some very thin cloud cover that I was able to sti! ll see bright stars through and I could see the white circles slightly dim as it went behind one narrow cloud then get brighter after it passed over it into the clear for a bit and then went behind more cloud cover and got smaller the further away it was and dimmed and then it was gone. This all happened very fast. I estimate the total time from it first catching my eye till it went out of sight was 4 seconds. I know for a fact it was not a plane or a satellite. Way too incredibly fast to be either. The object made no noise. It was purely silent. I also pulled up airplane radar flight records online between 12:10 and 12:20 and there was no planes flying over the city in this timeframe. I talked to an individual at a local airport about it and they stated that it could be a secret military aircraft as they fly those in the middle of the night so they aren't easily seen. Whether this is true or not I have no idea. It suppose it could be as it was headed in the direction of a ! nearby air force base.  About me: I'm in my twenties, have very good eyesight and don't use glasses/contacts, have good hearing etc.

records.summary: 3 red/orange fireballs moved across the night sky and then disappeared, this happened in Spokane, WA.
records.story: 3 red/orange fireballs moved across the night sky and then disappeared, this happened in Spokane, WA. My friend and I were outside in front of our apartment building at 22:30, and I was standing up, she was sitting down in a lawn chair.   I saw two bright fireballs coming in from the east, and they were headed in a west-southwest direction.  They were probably about a 1/4 of a mile above us.   After a few seconds, a third fireball appeared out of nowhere and went in the same direction.  They disappeared into the same place, I mean they just vanished into thin air.   We live on the south hill of Spokane, and it was pretty clear here, no clouds to the east, and very few to the west-southwest.  These things were not going real fast, but maybe about as fast as a small plane would travel when going in for a landing, not very fast.   My friend and I sit outside to smoke during the day and at night, we are both 59 years old and have no reason to make this kind of stuff up.    After looking up sightings, we decided to make a report of the sighting of these 3 fireballs.   The fireballs were red/orange, did not leave a trail behind them and I saw nothing fall to earth when they disappeared.

records.summary: Lights seen onve Spokane.
records.story: Lights seen over Spokane. While looking off my back porch watched several of these objects slowly coming off the ground and slowly moving up then they just disapeared into the sky, seen several of them at first thought they were airplanes, but they were not flying in any formation at all.

records.summary: Multiple orange orbs over downtown Spokane.
records.story: Multiple orange orbs over downtown Spokane. While driving south through downtown Spokane- passing Spokane Club on the right.  I looked out of the drivers window while stopped at traffic light.  I noticed a steady orange light between the tree branches to my left.  The light was some distance above the trees, at about a 60 degree angle relative to my car.   I pointed out the object to my wife and opened the moon roof of the car so she could see.  My son in the back seat just behind me also saw the object.   At that time I noticed two other bright orange objects but lower and seemed to be following the first object spotted yet the tree were in a line from west to east.  The traffic light had changed so I needed to move and briefly thought they might have been military aircraft.  These lights did not make a sound I could hear, were not common aircraft light colors, and did not strobe so I dismissed that idea.  The lights were moving east-to-west against the prevailing winds which would exclude luminaria.  I thought the lights were very odd.   We proceeded south to the freeway onramp since we were headed home to the east in Spokane Valley.  I told my wife and son the keep an eye out for the objects we had just seen since I had to drive.  The highway is elevated above the city so we had a better view above the buildings.  I glanced several times over my shoulder to the left toward the objects.  I was able to get a good estimate of the altitude.  There were three objects I could clearly make out, but possibly four or five, since I was driving I was only able to focus on the first three objects.  Object furthest to the west (which I believe was the first object) was at about 1250 feet, the second two were at about 450 feet (above ground level).  They were about evenly spaced about 500 feet apart horizontally.  From I-90 the first object was roughly over Masonic Temple with the last object being over River Park Square.  I could clearly triangulate from the first sighting, the freeway sightings, and using size of the buildings in downtown Spokane for a reference.   After getting home I dropped off my wife, son and car at the house, this was about 2110.  I got in my truck and headed back downtown to investigate the objects, while driving to roof of parking garage at Sacred Heart Medical Center there was a brief flash of light in the pickup,  I think this was a mercury vapor streetlamp flashing or a surge to the truck cab lamp so not concerned.  Only stopped briefly to observe on the top level of west parking garage at SHMC.  No objects visible over Spokane at this time.   Returned home at 2130.

records.summary: Orange Spherical Orbs doing a Brilliant Show over the City sky.  Over 10 witnesses on the scene.
records.story: Orange Spherical Orbs doing a Brilliant Show over the City sky.  Over 10 Witnesses on the scene I am a ((job description deleted)) at the ((deletd)) here in Spokane, Washington.   Last night upon entering our ((deleted--work area)) on my 1st round at 8:45 pm; immediately I could see a number of highly luminous glowing orange spherical objects (orb like) through the trees as I looked west over the roof of our ((deleted)) toward the Convention Center of the Downtown area.   Having witnessed 3 of these objects 4 months ago and since having heard the sweeping reports from all over the country, I knew this was going to be a big event that I wanted as many people as possible to see.   So I immediately ran into our ((deleted--area))  and summoned as many interested witnesses as I could by asking everyone if they wanted to witness some UFO’s.  First thing; I had our ((deleted)) attendant accompany me as he along with many of his neighbors had personally witnessed over thirty of these same objects traveling through a couple weeks before I had over 4 months ago.  When we and the some 10 to 12 guests arrived on the scene, we were all amazed and perplexed at the show the near dozen of these firey orange objects were putting on as they floated around drifting upward and slowly gliding around from north to south with their distinctive luminous orange glow.   Because I was trying to acquire as many witnesses as possible, I was unable to closely examine the movements and activity of the objects for very long.  However, from what I did witness, they appeared and acted exactly the same as those I had witnessed some months back. After about 7 minutes had passed, and I was scrambling to get more witnesses to observe the phenomena and get it recorded, suddenly all but a few ((deleted)) came back in side and said they all just vanished.   I then worked my way back out and there remained one mother and her daughter who showed me the one orange ufo remaining.  They told me that after all the ufos vanished and everyone left, this one object suddenly lit up and remained as it was hovering with its’ distinct orange glow.   We watched on for a few minutes as this object stayed hovering only to lose its luminosity and vanish in thin air like the others…   The mother then showed me the multiple pictures she took with her smart phone and I gave her my email address and she got my name and insisted that her and her daughter would email me the pictures as well as a detailed account of what they witnessed. As I write this report, I am still waiting and hoping she delivers on her words. This was an extraordinary event witnessed by over 10 people who were all mesmerized by the show these objects put on.  In fact a couple ((deleted)) came to me afterwards and thanked me very much for alerting them so they could witness the extraordinary phenomena.   In hindsight, however it was very disconcerting to me that 2 of the teenagers who caught the whole incident on video went right back into the ((deleted)) showed just a few people and then went right back to watching a football game like nothing even happened.  When I asked them if they could put the footage on youtube they just kind of blew me off like they didn’t care.  I wish I had given them some money in exchange for the footage as it was the type of ufo event that many people hope to see their lifetime…

records.summary: I was on the phone in my front yard when I looked up in the sky and saw strobe lights on a craft for approx 10 sec and stopped then the
records.story: I was on the phone in my front yard when I looked up in the sky and saw strobe lights on a craft for approx 10 sec and stopped then the object was stationary.  then it went dim to orange then slowly went west.  my son and wife saw it to.   it was south of me approx 3000 ft up.  I know because the radio towers on the mountain it was over are at 2000 ft.   Also, I   very awkward that I go out and look and there's a craft strobe light back at me.

records.summary: 3 spheres in sunset sky
records.story: 3 spheres in sunset sky My husband and I were driving home to Seattle via I-90 from Spokane it was 16:00hrs.  I was taking many photos due to the strange sky above - I did not see these 3 spheres at the time as my focus was on the Sunset but also the Sun high above, then we witnessed a second Sunset later on.   It was only when I got home did I notice the 3 spheres in a triangle formation.  There seems to be one yellow one in the center, and two orange/red spheres to the side.  These were taken through the windscreen, however they are not on the windscreen as they move position in the sky, these are distant objects.  Please see photos

records.summary: Box with wings flying low and fast.
records.story: Box with wings flying low and fast At around 5:30 I saw a large rectangle shape under a pair of wings flying low near I-90 and Freya.  The object had no propellers or engines but did have a white/blue strobe light on top.  From the side it appeared to be towing the object and the wings were at a 45 degree angle like when a plane takes off. It went straight from South to North and disappeared with in a minute.  When I wa directly behind it the wings looked huge like 70' or so, and were barely visible, like they were 3 inches thick.  Strange sight can't explain!

records.summary: Large bright stationary spherical object appearing to be with earth atmosphere about 45 degrees above horizon.
records.story: Large bright stationary spherical object appearing to be with earth atmosphere about 45 degrees above horizon Driving SW on I-90 from Spokane Valley, Washington, I observed a very bright stationary spherical object in the SW sky for 3-4 min.  The object was moon-like in appearance minus the shadows, and was clearly in front of the thin layer of clouds and sunrays which were behind and above the object.   It was very bright, glowing, light gold with a very smooth surface -luminescent rather than metallic.  It appeared to be solid – light was not reflecting through it.  Size is difficult to guess, altho it seemed to be quite large and about a 45 degree angle above the horizon.   No clue as to distance or height, however, it was close enough to see details.   Outline of object was distinct with sky behind darker than object itself.  It remained stationary, but appeared to turn and change to a slightly faceted shape with what appeared to be two small triangular fins one above the other, protruding from behind.  The fins appeared to be of the same material and color.   As I continued driving SW toward the object, I saw a very small, very black spot which at first appeared and disappeared so I wasn’t sure if I actually was seeing it.   The black spot appeared to expand until it was very clearly a rectangular shape located on the lower right quadrant (from my viewpoint).  It remained visible, but rectangular shape appeared to change to an hour glass shape.   The object remained stationary, but the descending sun made it more and more difficult to view.   At this point, the terrain obscured my view as I drove behind and up up a small hill.  At the top of the hill (about a minute later), I had full view of the SW sky and the object was gone.

records.summary: Shiny spherical object traveling across sky SE-NW direction, hovers for 10 mins in NW, then leaves in N-S direction.
records.story: Shiny spherical object traveling across sky SE-NW direction, hovers for 10 mins in NW, then leaves in N-S direction I was in my kitchen making lunch and I noticed my neighbors (about 5 of them, one who is retired military) were all outside talking, pointing and looking at the sky, and one of them had binoculars.  So I went out to see what was up. It was noon and the sky was absolutely clear of clouds. I observed was a spherical object moving across the sky, coming from the SE, headed in a NW direction. It was moving at a steady speed, slower than a satellite, maybe as fast as an airplane that was REALLY high (so I am guessing around 500-800 miles per hour).  The object appeared to be higher than most aircraft fly around here, but still definitely within the atmosphere.  It was extremely shiny.  It glinted a lot as it reflected the bright noon-time sunshine.  The light it reflected was white, which gave me the impression that the object was silvery and metallic.  It was hard to make out any details other than light, but because it was so evenly reflective, it seemed like it must have had a smooth surface. The object moved at a constant speed across much of the sky, about 75 degrees above the NE horizon once directly overhead, all the way from the SE horizon until almost to the NW horizon, in about 5 minutes time, until it stopped and just sat in one spot about 25 degrees above the horizon for about 10 minutes.  It still seemed round and very shiny.  I thought it was a single light, but my husband and my daughter thought they could sometimes see two "lights," very, very close together.  It glinted a lot, like the object or the surface was moving ever so slightly, even while seemingly standing still.  There was never a time when there was not light reflecting from the object; it just changed in intensity, like a silver beaded windchime blowing in the breeze (but without any visible change in direction). After a bit, the object started to move again, toward the South, at the same speed as before. It soon went behind my neighbor's trees, from my vantage point, and the object was so far away and it was so bright outside that I couldn't find it again.  After a bit, the neighbors lost it too and went back inside.  During the sighting, there were no other aircraft in the sky (which is not very common around here, since the Spokane Airport and Fairchild Air Force Base are only about 10 miles away). However, about 10 minutes after the UFO disappeared, I noticed two airplanes in the sky (with an obvious airplane shape to each of them, as opposed to the UFO), and both left distinct contrails. The UFO had left no trails at all, even though it was traveling at jet speeds.  The UFO did not give off any sound that was audible to me, but neither did those two airplanes, so it doesn't mean the craft didn't make noise way up high. If I were to guess, I would say this object was larger than a Boeing 747, but not more than twice as large.  After the sighting, it seemed like there was more airplane traffic than usual, but it may just been because we were looking to the sky more than usual. Again, we live close to an airport and a base, so airplanes are common in our skies.  The thing that makes this sighting stand out to me is the fact that the object had been moving in a NW direction, stopped and hovered in one spot for several minutes, and then started moving in a S direction. No airplane I have ever seen can hover like that, nor does it look round. Drones have wings or arms for rotors, so they should look more irregular than a sphere, and they shouldn't be as large as this was. No helicopter I have ever seen appears to be silver and round and that large when that high in the air (one would have been a speck). The ISS and satellites do not stop and then change direction.  I have never before seen a UFO and I was so shocked by this sighting that I watched, dumbfounded. I was worried I wouldn't be able to locate it again if I went for my camera, plus I wasn't sure if my camera would capture more than a glinty speck because the object was so far away. After the fact, I regret that I didn't dash quickly for my cell phone and get a video of this so as to share it with friends and family.

records.summary: Orange/red light in the sky moving from east to west seen in southern sky gone 30 seconds after spotted.
records.story: Orange/red light in the sky moving from east to west seen in southern sky gone 30 seconds after spotted I thought I was looking at a star then I realized it was too bright and too close to be one.  The colour changed back and forth from orange/red to silver.  It was travelling in the sky from east to west.  I watched it until it was gone.  The light flickered a few times and then it turned off. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: What was that?
records.story: What was that? Saw three blinking lights in the sky moving in formation and blinking at different times.  The shape the lights made were in a triangle against the blue sky and then gone…

records.summary: On Saturday 11-23-13 at approximately 7:15pm I let the dog outside to go to the bathroom.  The backyard faces south.  I looked up in t
records.story: On Saturday 11-23-13 at approximately 7:15pm I let the dog outside to go to the bathroom.  The backyard faces south.  I looked up in the sky at about 45 degrees towards the southeast and saw 12 orangish flickering lights moving through the sky towards the south.  At first I thought it looked like Santa’s sleigh and reindeers light up.  As the lights curved and moved upwards  towards the south I noticed that they disappeared one by one as they were directly over our garage which is south of the house. 	I went inside and yelled for everyone to hurry up and get outside and look at the sky.  My husband, Sam Powell, and my neighbor who was over visiting, Zebbie Wassom, came outside.  I counted 10 lights in the sky.  We all watched for a few minutes.  There was no noise.  I saw new lights emerge from the distant southeast at about 30 degrees in the sky.  They appeared more of a flaming red color.  The lights followed an arcing pattern through the sky. (Appearing in the southeast, moving northwest, moving west, moving southwest, then moving south and disappearing.  All this activity occurred in the southern part of the sky.) Some lights were further apart from each other.  Some lights were higher than others but not by more than about 5 degrees.  Some lights appeared to change speed slightly.  Some lights appeared to change direction slightly.  As the lights got closer they all appeared more of an orange color. 	We all went back inside.  My husband got out the phone book.  Zebbie and I grabbed our cell phones and went back outside. It was 7:20 pm according to my cell phone as Zebbie called her husband who was at home across the street and told him to look out the window towards the south in the sky. 	Zebbie went back inside shortly thereafter.  I continued watching until the last light was gone at 7:24 pm. Overall, I counted about 15 lights in the sky at one time and about 24 lights total.   The lights were high up in the sky – not to be confused with airplanes coming in for approach to Spokane International Airport or Fairchild Air Force Base.  The lights appeared larger when they emerged from the distant southeast sky. When they were closer they were about the size of a regular star in the sky except they were bright and flickered.  The lights did not come down from the sky instead the moved across: in, around, and then out. The lights did not have a tail on them like a comet. I didn’t bother to try and record this event on my cell phone because I thought the clarity would be bad and besides it would be on the news with an explanation of what had happened. The rest of the evening and for a few days I watched  local TV news stations to see if anyone else saw it, but nothing was reported that day or since. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with this witness, and we found her to be exceptionally eloquent and objective in her description of the object she and her husband witnessed.  Very high-quality witnesses, we believe, and high-quality reports.  PD))

records.summary: On 11-23-2013, Saturday, about 7:15pm, my family, a guest and I went out back of my home to play with our dog. The sky was clear. While
records.story: On 11-23-2013, Saturday, about 7:15pm, my family, a guest and I went out back of my home to play with our dog.  The sky was clear. While there we were looking around into the sky and the neighborhood.  Then my wife ((name deleted)), happened to look toward the southeast and notice all these lights popping out.  There had to be about a dozen or so when she said look at all those lights. They appeared to be a bright fiery read in color and changing to an almost orange color.  I would guest they were not as far away as the stars.  We got as quiet as possible to notice if there was any sounds.  We noticed none. Then, the further they went to the northwest they would stop and move back and forth toward one another, like they were playing, then stopping and going.  They seem to be in some random formation.  Suddenly the first several would disappear to the south of where I reside, then more would appear from the southeast. This display lasted from about 7:15 pm until about 7:25 pm. I then called three media stations, KREM-2; KXLY-4 and KHQ-6 and none of them seem to be interested in my conversation, at all.

records.summary: Hovering, undentified, flying object that changed colors and traveled through the sky
records.story: Hovering, undentified, flying object that changed colors and traveled through the sky The location that we live at in Spokane is app. 500 feet higher than the rest of Spokane, WA.  On 2/5/14 I was awoken to a loud sound that sounded like after burners of a rocket.  The noise was coming from right above our house and it shook our room.  My father was an airplane pilot and we have airplane's and helicopter's that go over our house frequently.  So, I am very familiar with the noises that they make when they travel over the air space above our home.   I knew right away that this was no airplane because I grew up around airplanes as my dad was a pilot.  The noise startled me because I never, ever had heard anything like that before in our area.   I got up looked out our large bay window from the 2nd floor of our house and couldn't believe what I saw.  I saw an object that was changing colors that was hovering and like floating westbound through the air.   My husband and son also got up and witnessed the object, and they couldn't believe what we were seeing.  The object changed colors from a beautiful emerald green, red, blue, orange and also to a white color.   We were so surprised to see such an object right in front of our own eyes that was so beautiful just traveling slowly through the air westbound towards Seattle.   We watched it and watched it, of all times none of our cameras were working.  While watching it at one point we did witness what appeared to be a helicopter approach the object.  They kept their distance from the object, they didn't get close to it.  The helicopter stayed back from it, again didn't get close to it at all and it finally it backed off and left the object alone.  The object appeared to be larger than the helicopter but not by much.   The object just seemed to hover in the sky slowly moving westbound.  We watched the object until we could no longer see it any longer.  We were shocked to see such an unbelievable site, and we have always been uncertain about if there are UFO's in the world or not.   After seeing th! is AMAZING BEAUTIFUL OBJECT, the three of us that watched it for the a pp. 44 minutes are believers!!  We would of never ever had the opportunity to witness such an unbelievable, AWESOME, site it the noise it had made when it was traveling through the sky hadn't awoken me again at about 2:00 AM, when we normally are sleeping.   We felt excited, had so many questions that we will never have answered and we did feel somewhat scared, as the questions go on and on. In the end we felt very blessed to see such a site, and again we now are believers in UFO's as our family had just seen one.   It shook our room and the noise was unbelievable.  Without the noise that it made in passing through the sky in the middle of the night, we would never ever witnessed such an astonishing site of a object that appeared to be a real UFO!! ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with the witness, and we found her to be quite eloquent and serious-minded.  The object may have passed quite close to Fairchild AFB, which is located just west of Spokane.  PD))

records.summary: Two small, intense, blinking lights circled above Spokane Valley, WA.  ((NUFORC Note:  Advertising lights??  PD))
records.story: Two small, intense, blinking lights circled above Spokane Valley, WA. Peter Davenport: I just saw the strangest of the three or four UFOs I have seen.  At about 6:57 PDT, I saw two blinking lights zooming around.  It started with one very small and bright, blue-white light heading east, which appeared to be a satellite. I was about fifteen miles north of Spokane, WA and looking to the south.  A second one appeared slightly to the east of the first and heading west, toward the other one.  They were blinking randomly about one second each two to four seconds.  At this time I thought I was watching something taking place a thousand feet above I-90, in Spokane Valley.  They might have been a few miles north of Mica Peak. As the two small, intense, blinking lights interacted for thirty seconds or so, they changed speed and direction.  Because the lights were off more than they were on, it was hard to tell which one was which as they cirlcled.  Sometimes they may have been moving at about the speed of airplanes and sometimes much faster than any airplane.  I blinked my eyes and asked myself if I was really seeing it in the physical realm and the answer was yes.   After twenty or thirty seconds, they separated and disappeared when they were about a mile apart, providing they were actually above I-90.  --  I can't rule out some sort of Laser light show, but it sure looked like an interdimensional light show to me.       -- Sincerely, J S

records.summary: Odd light twinkle.
records.story: Odd light twinkle It was about midnight and I wanted to see the supermoon at its fullest and needed to water my garden, I went to turn on the outside water and something felt a little eerie, I looked up and to the North and I saw what I describe as a twinkle like the end a meteror but as soon as I focused on it, it went black.   I didn't feel excited or happy, it made me feel scared.  I watered my plants in a hurry and still felt uneasy about it.  It was probably less than 50 yards above me.

records.summary: Orange sphere that was completely silent.  It moved from West to East for about 1 minute, and then sped up and changed direction to N.
records.story: Orange sphere that was completely silent.   It moved from West to East for about 1 minute, and then sped up and changed direction to north.  Eventually it disappeared on the horizon.  Bright from every angle and completely silent.   Altitude was approximately 1000 feet.   It was dusk. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: High flying, fast, large white object Eastern Washington
records.story: High flying, fast, large white object Eastern Washington I was waiting at the Hastings Park and Ride bus Terminal in North Spokane.  I was waiting for the 11:55 am bus headed north to my home in Deer Park.  I estimate the time to be about 11:30 am.   I was facing north and I happen to look up at the sky to see a very large, white object heading east to west at height and with speed.  What surprised me was the speed it seemed to travel and the size it was.  Normally, when one sees a plane at that height the plane is small, hard to see, and moving at a speed that appears slow to our relative perspective.   This white colored object, however, was 3 to 4 time larger that a plane would be at that height and is travel through a large cloud break at a very fast pace.  Much faster than any convention planes I’ve ever seen.   Oddly enough it also left no condensation trail of any kind.   I would normally discount this as the sun reflecting off an airplane but I can still not account for the size of this thing, the lack of any type of condensation trail, and the speed it was moving at.

records.summary: I witnessed unexplainable bright light with very strange movement in Spokane.
records.story: I witnessed unexplainable bright light with very strange movement in Spokane. I witnessed unexplainable bright light movement in sky tonight.  I live out in the country in South Spokane, and I went out past my yard and house to edge of woods to hear the owls.   I looked up at what I thought may be very bright plane or maybe satellite but the movement was like NOTHING I have ever seen before.  This light was almost falling slowly in the north eastern part of the sky.  Almost a 60-70• angle above horizon.   It would "fall" or orbit downward in a feather like trajectory, swaying from left to right slowly and then stopping perfectly still with no blinking lights or sound of any kind.  Then it would start up again never really following a pattern but seemingly heading downward toward the horizon.  Then it just disappeared.   I have been a lifelong satellite watcher and can say it was a bit bigger or at least brighter but not much.  It had absolutely no flashing lights and when planes or helicopters are that close there is sound.   Not sure what to think.  Does ISS behave this way?

records.summary: Silver cylinder no wings no sound.
records.story: Silver cylinder no wings no sound. A very brief sighting in that I noticed this object the size of a normal passenger  airline except it had no wings.  It was flying south east of my location at a hight lower than normal.  I was entering  at park with trees, by the time I was able to get another clear look at it no longer was it visible. A clear day blue sky not a cloud.  This object was silver not a normal silver I don’t know what made it different in color it just was.  And thats about all I have with me a good cam maybe next time.

records.summary: Orb like vehicle with green and red glow hovering in one area then moving vertical, horizontal, and 180 degree turns.
records.story: Orb like vehicle with green and red glow hovering in one area then moving vertical, horizontal, and 180 degree turns. On Aug. 15, 2014, around 8:00 PM just after sunset in Spokane, Washington State, on the northeast side of town, my neighbors, my wife, and I were having a BBQ, when I noticed a green flash move very quickly across the sky.  I asked if anyone else had seen the light and they replied with a no.   About ten minutes later, my wife had asked, “Is that the Lights you saw?”  I said yes.   Then we realized that this was not normal, it was too large to be an online purchased drone, and it was not an airplane or a helicopter because there was no rotor noise and we would have heard it at the distance we were.   The craft was between 10 and 20 feet long and was emitting a bright green light with a faint red light with it.   This vehicle hovered for a few moments, then went vertical, horizontal, and even maneuvered in what appeared to be a 180 instant turn around without having to bank like a plane or helicopter, then it slowly descended behind the trees as if it were coming down to land.

records.summary: Sitting on My Deck and saw Fireball heading N x NE from Spokane Valley I-90 at Hwy 27 at arms leangth about the size of dime - pretty l
records.story: Sitting on my deck and saw fireball heading N x NE from Spokane Valley I-90 at Hwy 27 at arm's leangth about the size of dime - pretty large really, and moving not all that fast.  A white center and orange to yellow edges and yellow to white trail which followed about 1/3 of the sky - horizon to horizon - the trailing streak seemed much softer than the usual shooting star and was moving much slower.   I would estimate it at around 10-20,000 ft. ele. and If I had to guess it would have hit the Earth somewhere near Deer Park or Chewelah WA.  The duration was about 4-5 sec.. I have seen something similar in 1974 in Oregon but this one was much more colorful (yellow and orange and "floating" very slow for a meteor . . . Thanx

records.summary: Green and red light hovering silently around treeline block away from my house.
records.story: Green and red light hovering silently around treeline block away from my house. I was on my patio which faces south of 1800 W Cleveland, the wind was stating to blow a storm was coming in, then a pair of lights came up from the tree a block south, one was green and one was red they looked seperate but had the exact same movement.  First I noticed it come from the south side of the tree, its a bushy tall tree so like 150 feet tall and sits in the back of a vacant home on Grace.  The lights came half the distance closer to my patio at one point, staying at the same height then went back to the other side of the tree and went behind, then it went up real fast like it was propelled.   I'm from England but moved here 12 years ago and have gotten used to heavy airplane and helicopter traffic and this was neither because it was only a block away and didn't hear anything.  It went on for several minutes I thought it was longer but can't remember.   It seems as though it was looking for something in the tree the way it went back and forth and behind it.  The red and green lights were just glowing and basically and nothing else was seen.  I find it hard to describe.

records.summary: Black shiny orb over west Spokane during evening storm.
records.story: Black shiny orb over west Spokane during evening storm. A storm was approaching Spokane at 18:20pm, 8-2-2014, and the lights began to flicker in my house.   I went outside (still daylight with clouds ) to observe the storm and noticed strong winds pushing to the Northeast and birds scattering around.  Then a black shiny polished looking orb flies over in a perfect trajectory flying S.E. (like the ISS, I see it fly over at night alot)  The elevation could be around 2 - 4 hundred feet.   It could not have been affected by the wind as it seemed to be in an orbit like the ISS.  Did not make a sound and I continued watching until it went out of sight in the far S.E. and I know it wasn't ISS because this was under the clouds, black and much larger.   It did not appear to change in elevation during the 30 seconds it was viewable.  Again it was black and had a shiny polished look to it.   The size was not large from my perspective about the size of a half dollar at arm's length at its closest from my back yard it was just a bit east of my position in west Spokane but almost straight over so I got a good look at it.  I watched it until it got smaller and smaller until it was no longer visible. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with this witness, and we found hime to be both eloquent in his description of the sighting event, and sincere.  PD))

records.summary: Flat shaped white light traveling fairly slow, with a long trail of red and white tail, almost like what u would see from a plane.
records.story: Flat shaped white light traveling fairly slow, with a long trail of red and white tail, almost like what u would see from a plane.  Had sparkling dust like lights within the trail mist.  And had small sparkling white lights following, that would fade and come back.  Possibly a BIG meteor, but deff not anything I have ever seen.   Was like a giant slow moving shooting star with lots of color.  Almost beautiful!! ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering Chinese 3rd-stage rocket casing.  PD))

records.summary: Father and son witness two highly-reflective, disk-shaped craft, in the southeastern sky of Spokane.
records.story: Father and son witness two highly-reflective, disk-shaped craft, in the southeastern sky of Spokane. Telephoned Report:   An adult male contacted the UFO Hotline, and reported that he and his adult son had witnessed two highly-reflective, perhaps disk-shaped, objects in the southeastern sky, as viewed from the City of Spokane. The caller described himself as a serious amateur astronomer, having once used a hard-mounted 10-inch reflector telescope.   He stated that he had never witnessed such a phenomenon. ((NUFORC Note:  Neither witness has submitted a written, detailed, report, and the caller has not responded to multiple calls to his telephone number.  PD))

records.summary: Reddish-orange light over downtown Spokane, WA.
records.story: Reddish-orange light over downtown Spokane, WA. I was sitting in the park with my friend, stargazing.  I suddenly saw a reddish orange light moving over downtown Spokane from what looked like the east.   It seemed too fast for a regular plane and as soon as I pointed it out, it curved hard towards south south-west, directly away from my pointing finger, and kind of corkscrewed, until we couldn't see it anymore.   About 5-7 minutes later, a plane appeared, taking almost the same path as the light, but much slower. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright light in front of cloud east of Spokane
records.story: Bright light in front of cloud east of Spokane Hi, My husband and I enjoy listening to Peter on Coast to Coast, but I never figured I would be sending in a report. I actually live in Spokane, north of Fairchild, down in the canyon… so not too far from Peter.   Yesterday, Tuesday, June 9th, I was heading into work eastbound on Hwy 2 towards I-90.  I was watching the geo engineering in the eastern sky, as there were three planes that I could see at the time that were spraying.   At about 7:45 just before I got to the I-90 ramp I saw something bright and round in front of a cloud, north of the three planes.  Honestly I have never seen anything like this before.  It was much larger than a star and much brighter than one.  It was round and just incredibly bright.   It did not move at all, just pulsated bright.  I watched it for about 10 seconds, then it disappeared into the cloud behind it.

records.summary: Yellowish orange sphere.
records.story: Yellowish orange sphere. For the past week, on and off, we have seen two orange spheres with lights moving slowly in the sky.  They move from south to northwest then to east

records.summary: 2 objects East of Spokane  pulsed for over an hour.  ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of 3 planets in eastern sky.  PD))
records.story: 2 objects East of Spokane  pulsed for over an hour 10-31-2015 4 am to 5 am  East of Spokane, there appeared  quantity (2)  two  objects.  The two objects glow, then would pulse and expand  to 4 objects each. and return to  two objects ,(not a airplane strobe)    Objects  appear to be much larger than a star.  The two  objects did not move,  the spread when pulsing was much greater than dirty atmosphere reflection would  explain.  the two objects   pulsed every 4 seconds I  watched   for about an hour ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I looked out my window and saw this glowing light.  It was to bright and to big to be a star.  ((NUFORC Note:  Venus??  PD))
records.story: I woke up to go to the bathroom at 5 o'clock in the morning.  After I finished, I looked out my window and saw this glowing light.  It was to bright and to big to be a star.  The light was pulsing on and off.  I was rubbing my eyes to make sure this was real.  After 5 minutes of me watching, it disappeared.   Then, after that, I stayed up for about 45 minutes, looking into the sky.  Then I eventually fell asleep, not seeing the object again.  The object looked like it had 5 separate lights almost like an atom particle.  The light it produced was white, like any standard light bulb color you can find in the store.

records.summary: 12+ blinking, pulsing, and darting around lights at varied distances for 5+ hours after power outages and less light pollution.
records.story: 12+ blinking, pulsing, and darting around lights at varied distances for 5+ hours after power outages and less light pollution. There were several circular, blinking lights in the sky.  Some were reddish in hue that blinked and pulsed white and very, very quickly--a greenish light.  There was a bright gold star-like light that moved then was hovering over the area.  There were three to four white, blinking lights that seemed to be aware that I was watching them.  When I waved at them, hoping they would be able to see me, their movements became more rapid and longer in distance.   During the three hours I was walking around in and out of the Hangman Hills neighborhood, I saw five to six "shooting stars".  However, I realized after the third one that they were moving a bit slowly to be shooting starts, and I believe that they were craft, dipping in and out of perhaps our dimension, or perhaps my disbelief and excitement prohibited me from being able to perceive them for a prolonged amount of time.   As I continued watching, different craft would become "seen" by me that were closer and closer to me.  I truly believe that they wanted to be seen and the whole experience was very peaceful, calm and loving.

records.summary: Many aircrafts one main with bright white light, bobbing and weaving; all of them.
records.story: Many aircrafts one main with bright white light, bobbing and weaving; all of them. Saw a very bright light and many smaller lights they were flashing colors being blue, white or yellow and green, the bigger light was showing colors but only around the light if you didn't look directly, all of the lights were moving up and down and side to side, I have videos and pictures of the event, is happening again currently, less extra crafts and the bright main one is way father away.  Never have I ever seen this kind of thing.  Keep your eyes and skies open.

records.summary: There's 1 big light that I've seen every night since I first spotted it.  ((NUFORC Note:  Three planets in the eastern sky.  PD))
records.story: There's one big light that I've seen every night since I first spotted it, some nights there's only one, other nights there's 3,. . .it just bobs in the same spot, you can tell that it's moving, the colors on it are white, purple, and green, almost looks like a star to the naked eye but with binoculars you can tell that it's not ((NUFORC Note:  Three planets in the eastern sky.  PD))

records.summary: Saw one green fireball zoom downward.  ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a meteor.  PD))
records.story: Saw one green fireball zoom downward. While driving south on Wall Street towards downtown Spokane, I saw green ball of light starting about 45 degrees up from the horizon, zooming down to horizon in less than 2 seconds and disappeared.   I would call it a "fireball" because it was much bigger than a star or the meteors I've seen. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a meteor.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright star like object that crossed sky then went straight up out of sight.
records.story: Bright star like object that crossed sky then went straight up out of sight. I have never reported any type of ufo before so this will be my first time.  I live in the city of Spokane by the college campus of Gonzaga.  I stepped out onto my front porch as I do often on a clear night and look up at the stars.  Instantly I noticed a very bright star to the south that at first seemed stationary but then started moving across the sky due north.  It looked like a very bright star much bigger then any satellite but had no lights that a aircraft would possess.   It traveled for maybe 5 seconds before stopping I expected at this point to be able to recognize the object but at that point it took off directly straight up shrinking in size and then disappearing.  I don't know what else to say except this was no satellite no aircraft or a illusion the object traveled far enough and definitely went straight up to rule out a illusion.

records.summary: Plane Vs UFO.
records.story: Plane Vs UFO This last summer me and my son were on the roof star gazing, facing west we saw the red orb type ufo fly from northwest to southeast, then a second or few later it flew back northwest from the southeast direction until it disappeared. What I believed makes this sighting so great  is that we saw a passenger plane flying about 2000k ft. below the ufo(the ufo was extremely high in the sky) so we could get a real reference of how fast the ufo was going which was a lot faster than the plane at a much higher altitude.

records.summary: Black Triangle Craft spotted in Spokane, Washington.  ((NUFORC Note:  Serious report, or maybe not??  PD))
records.story: Black Triangle Craft spotted in Spokane, Washington It was a fairly clear day in Spokane, me and my parents were on a walk with our dog while I was visiting and we heard a noise coming from the sky.  The sound however was not the sound of an airplane from the nearby airport.  I looked up to the sky to see a small black triangle craft coming down to earth, I panicked and pointed it out to my parents (I'm 23). We did not get a photo graph of the object.   The craft slowly descended down to the sidewalk, the craft was around 4 ft. long and 2 ft. tall. and had green and blue lights all over, the craft also made a few sounds along the lines of "boop beep ziiip". The craft hovered in front of me and my parents for a short time before shooting off into the sky. Us 3 are the only witnesses to this event as far as I know. I'm not sure if our dog should count as a witness or not, he did bark at the object a few times, so if you do count as animals as witnesses, it's 4. ((NUFORC Note:  Serious report, or maybe not??  PD)) ((BEGIN ADDENDUM #1 FROM SOURCE OF REPORT)) Dear Peter, Thank you for replying to my report. My report is 100% sincere. My parents don't believe in aliens and are dismissing this and don't want to get involved, so I'm all you've got right now.  I live east coast near D.C.  I own a Cessna 172g and fly it for recreational purposes, I am currently looking into a job to be a Pilot. I did not fly a plane to Spokane where my parents live, I took a long and beautiful car trip.  My phone is currently in repairs after I accidentally spilled my beer on it yesterday and will not be able to take calls for a while.  If you have any questions feel free to Email me. ((END #1)) ((BEGIN ADDENDUM #2 FROM SOURCE)) I understand that you would expect this report to be a hoax, but I'm dead serious, this has to be the strangest thing that's ever happened to me. ((END #2)) ((ADDENDUM #3 FROM SOURCE)) there is no one to my knowledge who saw it, when we got back home I had asked a few neighbors if they had seen what I had seen and told me I was crazy, I'm assuming they haven't seen It. I had my parents give me a run down of the whole situation, my father believes the craft may have been scanning us, my mother doesn't know what to think, but they don't want to be involved with the whole situation ((END #3))

records.summary: Fast moving white orb moving north.
records.story: fast moving white orb moving north. Clear night.  Could see a lot of stars & a few aircraft flying in area.  Out in backyard with my dog.  Looked up in sky & noticed far up in sky a very fast moving white colored circle shape moving north.  It seemed to suddenly appear from the southern part of sky.  It was not aircraft. It was too fast & moved unlike a plane.

records.summary: Brightly lit triangle craft hovered 50 feet above roadway Spokane, WA.
records.story: Brightly lit triangle craft hovered 50 feet above roadway Spokane, WA. I was driving home on High Drive around 9:30 pm Wednesday Nov. 9, 2016, after having dinner in downtown Spokane when this incident occurred. I was headed east on High Drive and approaching the intersection of High Drive and Grand Boulevard when I saw this giant incredibly bright object in the sky that was immediately above the treetops about four blocks away. At first, I wasn't sure if it was a panel of stadium lights, but there's no stadium anywhere nearby. I live just a short distance from where this incident occurred, and I have been there thousands of times over the past 17 years, and I have never once seen a light like that anywhere in the neighborhood. I drove toward the object, and pulled over on the south side of East 43rd Avenue, between South Scott and South Garfield Streets. What I saw was a giant triangle that was only 50 feet or so above me, and hovering above some trees in a residential neighborhood. The object appeared to be about 180 feet long (half the distance between Scott Street and Garfield Street on 43rd Avenue) and 90 feet wide. There were white lights all the way around the sides of the triangle, and it was hovering in one place and didn't make any noise. Where I pulled over by the side of the road was almost directly underneath this triangle object, and I could see dark black circles on the underside. I turned my engine off, and watched this triangle object. There was absolutely no noise coming from it. Right after I pulled over, the thing started moving slowly from east to west. I reached in my purse to grab my cell phone so that I could take a picture, and I kept looking back at the triangle when suddenly it took off faster than anything ever seen my life. It was the strangest thing I've ever seen. When the object took off, it went west. It's speed was so fast that had I blinked my eyes, I would've missed it. The entire incident lasted about 10 minutes (9:30 to 9:40 pm). I know this because I had just looked at my dashboard clock as I approached the intersection of High Drive and Grand Boulevard, and I called my mother immediately afterward to tell her what I had seen. If I was to compare the size of the triangle from my perspective it to the size of a full moon, it was dozens if not hundreds of times bigger. If I was to compare the size of the triangle to my clenched fist held at arm's length, it was much, much larger. Although I was alone in my car, I am absolutely certain that there were other witnesses to this incident. When I reached the intersection of Grand Boulevard and High Drive at 9:30 pm, there were several Spokane Police officers standing in the flowerbeds of a private residence and talking to an older gentleman. They were parked in the driveway of the house on the north side of High Drive. They appeared to be looking for something in the flowerbeds adjacent to the roadway at a private home on the south side of High Drive. While I was parked on 43rd Avenue and watching the triangle, another car (vehicle #2) drove by my car. Vehicle #2 was headed east to west on 43rd Ave. and passed directly under this giant lighted triangle. I am absolutely certain the driver of Vehicle #2 saw the triangle, because it was brighter than any light I have ever seen. When I got home, I went to the Spokane News page on Facebook to see if anyone had posted anything about this. The only thing I found was a post about a car accident that occurred at 6 pm that night at the intersection of Grand Boulevard and High Drive. However, was no sign of any vehicle collision at that intersection at 9:30 pm, so I don't think the  triangle object is related to the car accident earlier that evening. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone on two occasions, and she seemed to us to be quite eloquent and sincere.  We strongly suspect that she is a quite capable, and credible, witness.  PD))

records.summary: Two members of her family had seen two strange lights over Fairchild Airforce Base.
records.story: On September 28, a co-worker told me that on the prior evening, Sept 27th, approximately 9:30pm or 10:00pm, two members of her family had seen two strange lights over Fairchild Airforce Base.  Said there was cellphone video of one of the object.   As the two witnesses observed, jets were scrambled to intercept these lights.  As the jets approached, the two lights shot straight up and out if sight. ((NUFORC Note:  We have requested that the eyewitnesses be invited to submit reports, and we have expressed a desire to look at the video.  PD))

records.summary: UFO oval shape emitted immensely bright lights for one minute.
records.story: UFO oval shape emitted immensely bright lights for one minute. Saw it pull up with bright lights, floating semi close to the ground, but I was in the valley below looking upwards at the top of the tree covered hill.  It was barely above the trees.  It made a stationary stop and started to emit a very very bright light that illuminated for around a minute.  It had no flashing red lights like planes usually do, so intrigued I began to take a look. It pulls up with large white lights above the trees and stops, it then starts the lights.  I was scared because it was moving quite slow in comparison to that of a normal plane.  These lights lasted roughly one minute average.  I even recorded it on my phone in person I was staring at the blinding light.  In my recording, I was able to capture the image and even notice what seemed to be a second spacecraft blinking in a non-rhythmic pattern. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Oval craft emitted a extremely bright light for a minute then went back to the "normal" lights then headed W.
records.story: Oval Craft Emitted a extremely bright light for a minute then went back to the "normal" lights then headed W Washington RESUBMIT WITH MORE DETAIL. Saw the Oval lighted craft pull up 11:20PM lights lasted around one minute average. While it drove their were constant lights going on like headlights.  But the light it emitted during that minute was the brightest I had ever seen.  Never seen anything that can stay stationary until last night.  After the lights it headed towards W Washington.  It did this light thing at the top of the hill over some trees. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Just before 10pm, it streaked slower than a meteor, arching from S to N faster than a jet, it left silver blue trail. ((anon. report))
records.story: It was shortly before 10pm, it streaked slower than a meteor, arching from South to North faster than a jet, it left a silver blue trail behind it, it started to Dip low and it seemed to turn to West and looked like a bright green orb fairly large.   I know the airbase had air shows this weekend, but not at night. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: While trying to capture photos of the Northern Lights on Sunday evening/early morning Monday, I witnessed a flashing light that went fr
records.story: While trying to capture photos of the Northern Lights on Sunday evening/early morning Monday, I witnessed a flashing light that went from bright white to red and then would vanish.  I saw this happen twice between the span of 30 to 45 minutes.  The first one was sighted roughly around midnight and the second one, roughly 30 or so minutes later.   I tried to capture it on my camera, but was unable too.  I only witnessed this happening two times through the 3 hours I was taking photographs to the east, but it really stood out as unusual.   There was air traffic turning and coming in from the east to the west to land at Spokane International Airport (GEG), but what I saw did not resemble any kind of aircraft nor was it moving and transitioning through the sky, as it was stationary.   Object/Light appeared to be about 2,000 to 3,000 feet in elevation and about halfway between the Summit of Mount Spokane and Newman Lake, which resides to the South.

records.summary: Huge LED looking light hovering at tree line disappeared instantly after 4 minutes of watching.  No trace
records.story: Huge LED looking light hovering at tree line disappeared instantly after 4 minutes of watching.  No trace Saw a literal perfect sphere that was at my tree line of our house.  Watched for at least 4 minutes, don't know how long it was there was just getting home.  Took 3 pictures, doesn't capture the brightness or the size well but it does show the perfect sphere.  It instantly disappeared.  No trace, no light trail, nothing it was gone.

records.summary: The object started out appearing like a bright star or planet. Something seemed odd about it. It was staitionary for about five mins, t
records.story: The object started out appearing like a bright star or planet.  Something seemed odd about it. It was staitionary for about five mins, then it defended strait down, and we knew it was not a star.  We drove towards it to get a better look.  At that point it seemed to start following us.  It became a game of cat and mouse for 45 minutes.  At one point it hovered over us.  When it wasn't in the bright star position, it appeared to have a blinking blue lift, and a blinking red light.  It flew over us about 200 feet off the ground, and looked like a flat streamlined jet, no sound, and when it tunned, it remains horizontal no wing tips, gluiding through the air.

records.summary: Bright star like lights in north day time sky, Spokane Wa.
records.story: Bright star like lights in north day time sky, Spokane Wa. On Wednesday, July 19, 2006 I went out to wait for the mailman, my house faces north so I was observing the north sky while I waited, it was 1:15pm.  I noticed a bright star in the north about 45 degrees above my position just sitting and looking like the north star in the day time, unusual since it was bright and sunny with no clouds.  (about the same place you'd see the north star at night)  Then, coming from the east about two degrees above the first light, I witnessed another bright light coming towards it.  When light #2 was directly above the first one it stopped and now there were 2 star like lights above and below each other.  After several seconds the lower light started moving west and the upper one remained. It took a few minutes but light 2 eventually faded.  I believe the sun was reflecting off of what ever they were since the sun was directly behind in the south.  I have lived in Spokane all my life and have worked for the same company for 25 years.  I! spend a great deal of time outdoors and have witnessed several unidentified aerial phenomena events over the years.

records.summary: It was a radio announcer.
records.story: It was a radio announcer. Hello!  Back in 1974, my husband and I were driving along in Idaho, heading to Washington, and we kept hearing the guy on our favorite rock and roll station say things like, “Ya can't keep a secret in the ol deep freeze,” and this went on for 30 minutes between songs. So, when the news came on the jockey  said “a ufo had crashed in Indiana and four humanoid bodies were aboard and were deceased.  WELL!!!  Not another word about it, and lots of people I spoke to heard the radio announcement and were really curious. That is all I have to say, other than I have contacted the angel, Raphael, many times in meditation to go help others and he was always a blue color….I never understood that till recently and I cried finally knowing…I am not religious or organized in any way.  I have dreams, at least that is what I call them, which are very revealing but that's a long story. I mainly wanted to say something about that 1974 news that never reached many people, LOL. Thank you for being here.  8)

records.summary: Sept 9th, 2018 strange reddish brown, rectangular disc shaped object seen over Spokane.
records.story: Sept 9th, 2018, strange reddish brown, rectangular disc shaped object seen over Spokane. On September 9th, 2018, at approximately 10:35 A.M., I was looking out of my upstairs bedroom window on the South Hill of Spokane.  Facing north, I saw an object traveling across the sky that was dark reddish brown in color and was shaped like a disc or rectangle. The object didn’t make any noise or leave a trail. The sky was clear blue with no clouds or other objects in view.  I visually followed the object traveling in the sky from east to west for approximately five seconds when it dropped in altitude and changed direction moving south west of my window and out of view.  It moved horizontally and sped up when it changed direction.  The sighting lasted about ten to fifteen seconds. The object was too large to be a drone and at an altitude that would be occupied by aircraft seemingly.   I am 38 years old, often looked to the sky in admiration, but this is the first time I have seen anything resembling what I saw this morning. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with this witness, and he seemed to us to be quite sincere and sober-minded.  We suspect he is a very good witness.  PD))

records.summary: ((HOAX??))  Two white cigar-shaped craft close together.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: Two white cigar-shaped craft close together At 12 noon I saw two white cigar shaped craft very close together high in the sky.  One flew just ahead of the other, and they were close, about the width of a wing had they been airplanes.  They flew west to east across the sky and flashed briefly in the Sun, but I still saw no wings or contrails.   40 minutes later I saw two similar craft fly back east to west in the same configuration.  One emitted a thick white contrail and the other did not.  They may well have all been airplanes.  Now it is 14:24 and there are two contrails twisted like a double helix across the sky ESE to WNW.
